title: Brown v. Board of Education National Historic Site: Our Staff & Offices
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Management     Our Staff & Offices               Our Staff & Offices      Staff: Sherda Williams - Superintendent Lydia Baez - Administrative Technician Clayton Calder - Park Guide Terri Dixon - Information Technology Specialist Angela Estep - Education Specialist Katrina Fraise - Administrative Officer Treva Harris - Facility Operations Specialist Stephanie Kyriazis - Chief of interpretation, Education, and Visitor Services Nick Murray - Education Technician Bill Olliso - Maintenance Worker Brian Pracht - Custodial Worker Thom Rosenblum - Historian Justin Sochacki - Management Assistant Randal Standingwater - Park Guide Jennifer Tope - Park Guide Joan Wilson - Park Ranger (Interpretation)   Offices are located at: Brown v.
